channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Photoshop CC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Photoshop CC

item.title: CVE-2019-7986|2024-08-04T21:02:19.434Z -- adobe -- adobe%20photoshop%20cc
item.description: Adobe Photoshop CC versions 19.1.8 and earlier and 20.0.5 and earlier have an out of bound write vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-7094|2024-08-04T20:38:33.121Z -- adobe -- adobe%20photoshop%20cc
item.description: Adobe Photoshop CC 19.1.7 and earlier, and 20.0.2 and earlier have a heap corruption vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.
